locations.name: Abandoned Mega Mart
locations.description: A once-bustling retail giant now stands as a hollow shell of consumerism, its automatic doors permanently jammed open. The flickering emergency lights cast eerie shadows across overturned shopping carts and scattered debris. The faint smell of rotting produce mixes with something more sinister deeper in the store.
features: Bloody handprints leading to the stockroom
Shattered glass everywhere from looted electronics section
secrets: Rumored manager's office safe still intact behind barricaded door

special_types: Stockroom Stalkers (zombies that hide in shelves and ambush survivors)

locations.name: Sunset Ridge Subdivision
locations.description: A quiet suburban neighborhood frozen in time, with overgrown lawns and abandoned bicycles still lying in driveways. Most houses remain intact though some show signs of forced entry and struggle. The occasional wind chime creates an eerie soundtrack to the apocalypse.
secrets: One basement contains a survivor's detailed apocalypse journal
